body:
mine are:
1. Naruto
2. SAO 1
3. Attack on Titan
4. future diary
5. < give me one :)

how to get in touch with your anime

a small amount of us hate anime but BALLZI's 3 step guide will fix that :)

1. get your food ready: you dont wanna miss out on those shocker scenes!
2. skull a coke so you will get a fatigued feeling! < jozz : 3
3. make sure your are all hyped all for the next episode! if you are not consult a doctor < Doctapop may help you. i think?

title: Share your anime fixations!

replies.body:
When I watch anime, I grab a pillow and hug it just in case a scary or emotional scene comes up. Anime will give you all the feels <3

I've only started watching anime, but the ones I've watched are:
- Sword Art Online (loved the first arc, ALO was cool, and so far GGO isn't bad)
- Angel Beats (short and so sweet. The feels <3)
- Attack on Titan (Great action, nice and bloody, awesome story)
- One Week Friends (more feels <3 ups and downs everywhere)
- Death Note (still watching it, amazing so far. Love the story and concept)

I've heard No Game No Life was good, do you recommend it? :P

replies.body:
This topics again? Well i should update my list and put things not really well known:

- Tengen Toppan Gurren Lagan (maybe misspelled) | Nice Mecha (Robot controled by humans related anime) with a very nice worked history.
- Mirai Nikki | Epic and weird stuff happend there. Really funny and entertaining
- Anohana | I just have no words for this. JUST WATCH IT AND CRY LIKE ME!
- Angel Beats | Actually watching, very funny =3
